nodes.text: A tulrus sword was, as its name suggested, a type of two-handed sword that was made from the body of a tulrus, a species native to the planet Mustafar. They appeared to be constructed from one of the many spikes that protruded from the creature's body. Despite their size, the swords were known to be well balanced, as if they had been made out of a lighter material.

Tulrus swords appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
